name: Station Generator
detailed_description:
Need to generate a space station for a sci-fi themed table-top session? Station Generator does exactly that, by allowing you to generate a massive variety of space stations in an instant. Anyone can use this tool easily.

Use the included presets, or delve into the various options to design your own specific station, or just choose the size and type and go.

When you've got the station you want, you can save it as a .png file and print it and hand it out to your players, or upload it for your online campaign (Roll20 etc).

Features:
  • Basic, standard and advanced control modes
  • 20 Different room types
  • 7 Station types
  • 12 Presets included, or make your own and save them!
  • Fog of War with line of sight
  • 4 different types of grid and coordinates system
  • 5 tile sets to chose from
  • Room labels for ease of use
  • Input your own RNG seed
  • Ability to save as a .png in multiple resolutions
  • Soundtrack by Cornelis Jordaan and @amywrdn
  • German localised user interface option

Create maps in advance of your games in minutes giving you more time to spend on character and plot creation, or create the presets for the types of stations you'd like to see, and let your players roll for dimension and shape in game!

Station Generator was made to make the GM's life easier and to cater to ever level of user from the absolute beginner to the advanced user with modes to make it easy for any user to get to grips with what they're looking for. I'm also always happy to hear feedback on Station Generator and have included a feedback form you can use directly in Station Generator (internet connection required) to let me know what you think or if you've found a bug or even if you'd a cool story to tell!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 and better should be fine
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: mid range cards should be fine
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to use the feedback function
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 780ti
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to use the feedback function
